title: SOLD. Thanks for all the replies.
author: ZachS

posts.post_title: SOLD. Thanks for all the replies.
posts.post_content:
Most of you guys probably don't remember me. I used to post on the old board quite a bit when I was stationed in Italy (2005-2007). I've been out of collecting for a while... started a family. 

Anyway, I'm looking to sell some Southern Leaguers to raise some cash for a gun purchase. I'm looking to get around $1400.00 for the group of 10. I'm willing to hear offers on singles as well.

[IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/3552/67532437.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/7945/82815257.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/4747/36255302.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/7641/78011252.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4354/58875193.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/7616/68874940.jpg[/IMG]


Zach

I'll take them all.


You can contact me at [url]golddigger10932@hotmail.com[/url]  Im Phil.

Best of luck to whoever got the cards. Even though I was the first to respond, AND the seller told me my price shipped via paypal, somehow I wont be getting the cards. It seems the seller has zero ethics. He agreed with me to a price, and then 2 minutes later nixed our deal in favor of a few more dollars. Im actually glad now that I wont be doing business with this seller, as he doesnt understand HOW to do business properly.

I already explained the situation in the PM that I sent you. I've only posted a couple of times since this board has been up. I saw your message in my email and replied to you. After I clicked a link and came back into my private messages here there were several others that had sent messages (including messages sent before yours). 

I explained this to you... I told you I was sorry for the confusion. I don't know what else to tell you.

If I were on here to sell in a quick "hit and run" like you, I would have taken the few extra bucks too. But since im here for the longer haul, my integrity actually means something. Congrats on your sale.

I did not buy these... I inquired about buying the Harry Bay Card.

Chicago - Just wanted you to know...

Best,

JJ

You're right. I lack integrity. You should never buy anything from me. 

Sorry again,
Zach

Nashville, I got your email. Fortunately im not the only person who sees something wrong with this. Thanks. The seller claims that he had prior PMs to mine, yet he responded to mine with a total price shipped to my door? What really happened is that he got a higher offer right after mine and went for the extra cash. I once sold a coin for $35 on a BST and within 25 minutes I was offered $900 for the coin. It turned out to be a rare variety. What did I do? I sold it for $35 to the guy who offered my asking price first. Its called integrity, and while the extra $865 would have been long gone by now, I can still hold my head up high as my reputation in the hobby is unblemished. I've said my piece. Congrats to the guy who "outbid" me in this NON-auction format.:)

I said that I checked my email and saw a message from you. I replied to your message. When I went back to the board I had multiple PMs (and yes some of them were prior to yours). I sent you a second message a few seconds after the first explaining all of this and also apologizing for the confusion. I know it doesn't matter how I explain this to you...
